meaning: Existing or being everywhere at the same time: constantly encountered.
sentence: Smartphones have become ubiquitous in modern society.

meaning: Lasting one day only; lasting a very short time.
sentence: Fashion trends are often ephemeral, changing with every season.

meaning: Having a smooth rich flow; filled with something (such as honey) that sweetens.
sentence: The radio host had a mellifluous voice that was perfect for late-night shows.
